| HistoryText             = [[Natalia Romanova (Earth-616)|Natasha]], weary of espionage and adventure, retired to [[Arizona (State)|Arizona]] but was targeted, as were the other Black Widow subjects of the [[Black Widow Ops Program (Earth-616)|Red Room]], by the North Institute on behalf of the corporation [[Gynacon (Earth-616)|Gynacon]]. Natasha’s investigations led her back to Russia, where she was appalled to learn the previously unimagined extent of her past manipulation, and she discovered the Widows were being hunted because Gynacon, having purchased Russian biotechnology from Red Room’s successor agency 2R, wanted all prior users of the technology dead. After killing Gynacon CEO [[Ian McMasters (Earth-616)|Ian McMasters]], she clashed with operatives of multiple governments to help [[Sally Anne Carter (Earth-616)|Sally Anne Carter]], a girl Natasha had befriended in her investigations, whom she rescued with help from [[Matthew Murdock (Earth-616)|Daredevil]] and [[Yelena Belova (Earth-616)|Yelena Belova]].{{r|Black Widow Vol 3 1}}
